title: How to Cancel an HBO Max Subscription from Any Provider

steps.title: Go to https://max.com/subscription in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://max.com/subscription in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and username to do so now. [1] X Research source If you're using a mobile device, tap your profile picture and tap Subscription. If you're using a TV, select the cog icon and select Subscription .

steps.title: Select Cancel Your Subscription.
steps.content: Select Cancel Your Subscription . This is at the bottom of the page. If you don't see this option, your subscription is managed by a third party. You can see who bills you at the top. See the Third-Party Billing section for instructions on how to cancel your subscription.

steps.title: Click Continue to Cancel.
steps.content: Click Continue to Cancel . You may need to select this twice. Your subscription will be canceled at the end of your billing period.

steps.title: Amazon Appstore.
steps.content: Amazon Appstore. If you're being billed for Max by Amazon, you'll need to sign into your Amazon account. Go to https://www.amazon.com/appstoresubscriptions in a web browser. Sign into your account. Select Max underneath Your Subscriptions . Disable Auto-Renewal . The subscription will be canceled at the end of your billing period.

steps.title: Prime Video Channels.
steps.content: Prime Video Channels. You can subscribe to HBO Max directly via Prime Video. To cancel, do the following: Go to https://amazon.com/video/subscriptions/manage in a web browser. Click Cancel Channel next to Max .

steps.title: Apple.
steps.content: Apple. If you're being billed for Max through the App Store , do the following: Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad. Tap your Apple ID . Tap Subscriptions . Tap Max . Tap Cancel Subscription .

steps.title: Google Play.
steps.content: Google Play. If you're being billed for Max through the Google Play Store , do the following: Open the Play Store. Tap your profile icon. Tap Payments & subscriptions . Tap Subscriptions . Tap Max . Tap Cancel subscription .

steps.title: Samsung TV.
steps.content: Samsung TV. To cancel a subscription billed through Samsung TV, do the following: Sign into http://www.samsungcheckout.com/ in a web browser. Select Purchase History . Select Subscriptions . Select Unsubscribe next to Max .

steps.title: TV, phone, or Internet provider.
steps.content: TV, phone, or Internet provider. If you get your HBO Max subscription through a provider, you'll need to contact your provider. Log into your provider's website and look for add-ons or bundle subscriptions. Alternatively, contact your provider directly.

steps.title: You can cancel your Max subscription any time you'd like.
steps.content: You can cancel your Max subscription any time you'd like. However, if you want to avoid being charged for the upcoming month, be sure to cancel at least 48 hours before your usual renewal date. Once you cancel your subscription, you'll still have access to your membership until the last day of your current billing cycle. While HBO Max doesn't issue refunds, you may be eligible for a refund if you subscribed through a different platform, depending on their policy.

steps.title: Contact HBO Max support for all issues relating to charges.
steps.content: Contact HBO Max support for all issues relating to charges. If you were mistakenly charged or if you want a refund, you can contact Max directly on their website . Just click Contact Us in the bottom-right corner to get the process started. You can also use the website for technical issues with the app or website, account management, and more.
